update sys_owner_people
owner_name = #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

OWNER_TYPE = #{ownerType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update sys_owner_people set owner_name = #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel_phone = #{telPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_msg_notice = #{isMsgNotice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uint_id = #{uintId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_user_id = #{addUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_TYPE = #{ownerType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_ID = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_NUMBER = #{jobNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, owner_cert_type = #{ownerCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_cert_id = #{ownerCertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_cert_addr = #{ownerCertAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic1 = #{pic1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, pic2 = #{pic2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, face_pic = #{facePic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_owner_people d where owner_type = 4
AND owner_name LIKE concat('%',#{ownerName},'%')
AND mobile_phone LIKE concat('%',#{mobilePhone},'%')
AND owner_cert_id LIKE concat('%',#{ownerCertId},'%')
AND address LIKE concat('%',#{address},'%')
ORDER BY update_time DESC

select
from sys_owner_people d where d.id=#{value}

select
from sys_owner_people d where d.owner_cert_type=#{ownerCertType} and owner_cert_id=#{ownerCertId}

select
from sys_owner_people d where id!=#{id} AND d.owner_cert_type=#{ownerCertType} and owner_cert_id=#{ownerCertId}
